text: @marcmolinaro No sir. Furthermore, I will work secretly and tirelessly to undermine any and all efforts to limit my freedom and liberty, no matter what. I will fight to the fucking death before I lick a tyrant's boot.

@marcmolinaro I will not compromise my integrity and my values to lick a damn boot. I will vote for the best freedom and liberty candidate no matter what. If the tyrant Cuomo wins, I will not be licking his boot. If he and the government under him restrict my liberty further, I will not comply

@marcmolinaro You people that vote for an entrenched tyrannical candidate just so a different tyrant doesn't win are cowards. Cowards and fools!

I will stand behind freedom & liberty and smaller government even if I am standing ALONE.
@marcmolinaro So, with all due respect to anyone compromising American values to support the career politician swamp monster Marc Molinaro, I say- thanks for nothing.
